What are Golden Tickets?

Golden Ticket locations are special businesses in our ecosystem that offer 5x the normal points when you scan their QR codes!

  • 5x Points: Earn 5 times the normal points per visit
  • Limited Time: Golden tickets rotate between businesses
  • Same Rules: One scan per day per business
